title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Animal
description: A story of family and revenge

title: Dunki
description: A story about immigration

title: Jawan
description: A man driven by justice

title: Pathaan
description: RAW agent's thrilling mission

title: Gadar 2
description: Sequel to the iconic love story

title: OMG 2
description: Sequel about sex education

title: The Kerala Story
description: Based on true events

title: 12th Fail
description: Inspiring true story of IPS officer

title: Salaar
description: Story of a violent gangster

title: Tiger 3
description: RAW agent Tiger's new mission

title: Fighter
description: Indian Air Force officers' story

title: Sam Bahadur
description: Biography of Field Marshal Sam Manekshaw

title: Animal Park
description: Sequel to Animal

title: Meri Patni
description: Love story of a middle-class couple

title: Shaitaan
description: Supernatural horror thriller

title: Jawan
description: A man is driven by a personal vendetta to rectify the wrongs in society, while keeping a promise made years ago. He comes face to face with his mirror image - a law enforcement officer determined to take him down.

title: Pathaan
description: A soldier caught by enemies and presumed dead comes back to complete his mission, accompanied by old friends and foes.

title: Salaar: Part 1 - Ceasefire
description: A gang leader tries to keep a promise made to his dying friend and takes on the other criminal gangs.

title: Animal
description: A son undergoes a remarkable transformation as the bond with his father begins to fracture, and he becomes consumed by a quest for vengeance.

title: 12th Fail
description: The real-life story of IPS Officer Manoj Kumar Sharma who fearlessly embraced the idea of restarting his academic journey and reclaiming his destiny at a place where millions of students attempt the world's toughest competitive exam: UPSC.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: 3 Idiots
description: Three idiots, friends at an engineering college, learn life lessons while challenging the system.

title: Dangal
description: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
description: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

title: RRR
description: A fictional story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in 1920s.

title: KGF: Chapter 2
description: The blood-soaked land of Kolar Gold Fields has a new overlord now, Rocky, whose name strikes fear in the heart of his foes. His allies look up to him as their savior.

title: Pushpa: The Rise
description: A laborer rises through the ranks of a red sandalwood smuggling syndicate, making some powerful enemies in the process.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker's secret identity is revealed to the entire world. Desperate for help, Peter turns to Doctor Strange to make the world forget that he is Spider-Man.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
description: Three friends who were inseparable in childhood are just as close as adults, but they have grown apart. They decide to reunite for a three-week-long bachelor road trip to Spain.

title: Gully Boy
description: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

title: Andhadhun
description: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist who now must report a crime that was actually never witnessed by him.

title: Drishyam
description: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

title: Lagaan
description: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

title: Taare Zameen Par
description: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
description: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.
